1: וַתִּתְפַּלֵּ֤ל <sup>6419 </sup> <n>prayed</n> חַנָּה֙ <sup>2584 </sup> <n>And Hannah</n> וַתֹּאמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> עָלַ֤ץ <sup>5970 </sup> <n>rejoiceth</n> לִבִּי֙ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>My heart</n> בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>in the LORD</n> רָ֥מָה <sup>7311 </sup> <n>is exalted</n> קַרְנִ֖י <sup>7161 </sup> <n>mine horn</n> בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>in the LORD</n> רָ֤חַב <sup>7337 </sup> <n>is enlarged</n> פִּי֙ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>my mouth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> א֣וֹיְבַ֔י <sup>341 </sup> <n>over mine enemies</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> שָׂמַ֖חְתִּי <sup>8055 </sup> <n>because I rejoice</n> בִּישׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>in thy salvation</n>
2: אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> קָד֥וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>[There is] none holy</n> כַּיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>as the LORD</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Indeed</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>is no</n> בִּלְתֶּ֑ךָ <sup>1115 </sup> <n>for [there is] none beside</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>one</n> צ֖וּר <sup>6697 </sup> <n>thee neither [is there] any rock</n> כֵּאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>like our God</n>
3: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>no</n> תַּרְבּ֤וּ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>no more</n> תְדַבְּרוּ֙ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>Talk</n> גְּבֹהָ֣ה <sup>1364 </sup> <n>so exceeding</n> גְבֹהָ֔ה <sup>1364 </sup> <n>proudly</n> יֵצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>come</n> עָתָ֖ק <sup>6277 </sup> <n>let [not] arrogancy</n> מִפִּיכֶ֑ם <sup>6310 </sup> <n>out of your mouth</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>is a</n> אֵ֤ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>[is] a God</n> דֵּעוֹת֙ <sup>1844 </sup> <n>of knowledge</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> [וְלֹא כ] (וְלֹ֥ו <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> ק) נִתְכְּנ֖וּ <sup>8505 </sup> <n>are weighed</n> עֲלִלֽוֹת׃ <sup>5949 </sup> <n>and by him actions</n>
4: קֶ֥שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>The bows</n> גִּבֹּרִ֖ים <sup>1368 </sup> <n>of the mighty men</n> חַתִּ֑ים <sup>2844 </sup> <n>[are] broken</n> וְנִכְשָׁלִ֖ים <sup>3782 </sup> <n>and they that stumbled</n> אָ֥זְרוּ <sup>247 </sup> <n>are girded</n> חָֽיִל׃ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>with strength</n>
5: שְׂבֵעִ֤ים <sup>7649 </sup> <n>[They that were] full</n> בַּלֶּ֙חֶם֙ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>themselves for bread</n> נִשְׂכָּ֔רוּ <sup>7936 </sup> <n>have hired out</n> וּרְעֵבִ֖ים <sup>7457 </sup> <n>and [they that were] hungry</n> חָדֵ֑לּוּ <sup>2308 </sup> <n>ceased</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>Even</n> עֲקָרָה֙ <sup>6135 </sup> <n>so that the barren</n> יָלְדָ֣ה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>hath born</n> שִׁבְעָ֔ה <sup>7651 </sup> <n>seven</n> וְרַבַּ֥ת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and she that hath many</n> בָּנִ֖ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>children</n> אֻמְלָֽלָה׃ <sup>535 </sup> <n>is waxed feeble</n>

33: וְאִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And the man</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I will not</n> אַכְרִ֤ית <sup>3772 </sup> <n>of thine [whom] I shall not cut off</n> לְךָ֙ מֵעִ֣ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>from</n> מִזְבְּחִ֔י <sup>4196 </sup> <n>from mine altar</n> לְכַלּ֥וֹת <sup>3615 </sup> <n>[shall be] to consume</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֵינֶ֖יךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>thine eyes</n> וְלַאֲדִ֣יב <sup>109 </sup> <n>and to grieve</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>thine heart</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> מַרְבִּ֥ית <sup>4768 </sup> <n>and all the increase</n> בֵּיתְךָ֖ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of thine house</n> יָמ֥וּתוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall die</n> אֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n>
34: וְזֶה־ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> לְּךָ֣ הָא֗וֹת <sup>226 </sup> <n>And this [shall be] a sign</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יָבֹא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>unto thee that shall come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>concerning</n> שְׁנֵ֣י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>upon thy two</n> בָנֶ֔יךָ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>concerning</n> חָפְנִ֖י <sup>2652 </sup> <n>on Hophni</n> וּפִֽינְחָ֑ס <sup>6372 </sup> <n>and Phinehas</n> בְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> אֶחָ֖ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>in one</n> יָמ֥וּתוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>they shall die</n> שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>8147 </sup> <n>both</n>
35: וַהֲקִימֹתִ֥י <sup>6965 </sup> <n>And I will raise me up</n> לִי֙ כֹּהֵ֣ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>priest</n> נֶאֱמָ֔ן <sup>539 </sup> <n>a faithful</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to what</n> בִּלְבָבִ֥י <sup>3824 </sup> <n>according to [that] which [is] in mine heart</n> וּבְנַפְשִׁ֖י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and in my mind</n> יַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[that] shall do</n> וּבָנִ֤יתִי <sup>1129 </sup> <n>and I will build</n> לוֹ֙ בַּ֣יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> נֶאֱמָ֔ן <sup>539 </sup> <n>him a sure</n> וְהִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and he shall walk</n> לִפְנֵֽי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> מְשִׁיחִ֖י <sup>4899 </sup> <n>mine anointed</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for</n> הַיָּמִֽים׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
36: וְהָיָ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>Everyone</n> הַנּוֹתָר֙ <sup>3498 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass [that] every one that is left</n> בְּבֵ֣יתְךָ֔ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>in thine house</n> יָבוֹא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֣ת <sup>7812 </sup> <n>[and] crouch</n> ל֔וֹ לַאֲג֥וֹרַת <sup>95 </sup> <n>to him for a piece</n> כֶּ֖סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of silver</n> וְכִכַּר־ <sup>3603 </sup> <n>and a morsel</n> לָ֑חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of bread</n> וְאָמַ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and shall say</n> סְפָחֵ֥נִי <sup>5596 </sup> <n>Put</n> נָ֛א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אַחַ֥ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>me I pray thee into one</n> הַכְּהֻנּ֖וֹת <sup>3550 </sup> <n>of the priests' offices</n> לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>that I may eat</n> פַּת־ <sup>6595 </sup> <n>a piece</n> לָֽחֶם׃ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of bread</n> ס
